Articles.Content:
KSP puts the same Kerbals in your rocket every time. Anyone thought, or is there one out there, of making a mod to randomize what kerbals get put into your rocket at launch?

Thanks

Tuck
You can pick the kerbals that go in the rocket

Pointless Creations Inc.,

I believe the point is that KSP always chooses the same Kerbals unless you pick the Kerbals. In any case, I know there's a mod for that, but I can't remember the name. It should be on the Community Mods & Plugins Library sticky in the Release subforum, unless it's not working with 0.24.

I have looked for a current mod but will step up my efforts if you believe there already is one. I already have a pre-flight check list on my desk with stuff like did I add batteries and solar panels...I have a hard time remembering the required stuff.
I found one somewhere it was called (something) roster I'll post if I find it again
Awesome, I will check it out when I get home.
